channel.title: Help - ("Shops")!
channel.description:
[center][i][b]Welcome[/b], i'm looking for some help. It's quite simple but it's not possible for me to succeed. I'm editing the prices of the items in the shop. I've loaded up item.cfg. I've then scrolled down to the item that i'm going to edit. I would like to make an item cost [b]500gp[/b]. I've changed the code to this.[/i]
[code]Item = 1155 Bronze_Helmet A_Helmet. 500 500 500 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 10[/code]
[i]I compile, then visit my shop. I've checked the value of the shop and it says that the item costs, [b]792gp[/b].[/i][/center]

item.title: Help - ("Shops")!
item.dc:creator: @crackheadKD crackheadKD
item.description:
@crackheadKD wrote:

Abyssal Pk:

Yeh, i’m not that much of a noob. Thankyou for the help though. It’s like the amount is done in euros?

I’m just asking I’ve made that problem a couple times without realizing… Not that I’m stupid, I just forget sometimes…

Read full topic

item.title: Help - ("Shops")!
item.dc:creator: @Abyssal_Pk Abyssal Pk
item.description:
@Abyssal_Pk wrote:

Yeh, it’s done in euros. I required 500gp.

500/3x2=333.33333333333333333333333333333

The value then equals, 528gp. I suppose it’s close enough.

Read full topic

euros lmfao… its fucking gold on a fucking game… and the it goes id amount id amount and you go into your item cgf find the one u wanna change priced and its the first 2 numbers idk fuck iy

item.title: Help - ("Shops")!
item.dc:creator: @Abyssal_Pk Abyssal Pk
item.description:
@Abyssal_Pk wrote:

[center]Welcome, i’m looking for some help. It’s quite simple but it’s not possible for me to succeed. I’m editing the prices of the items in the shop. I’ve loaded up item.cfg. I’ve then scrolled down to the item that i’m going to edit. I would like to make an item cost 500gp. I’ve changed the code to this.

Item = 1155	Bronze_Helmet	A_Helmet.	500	500	500	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10

I compile, then visit my shop. I’ve checked the value of the shop and it says that the item costs, 792gp.[/center]

Read full topic
